title.narrative: Support to CLV cluster BD and training

description.narrative:
Oxfam-Wereldwinkels makes people in Flanders and Brussels aware of unjust world trade and is committed to eradicating this. According to Oxfam-Wereldwinkels, encouraging consumers to choose fair products is the best way to succeed.
Oxfam-Solidarity fights against injustice and poverty. We do this through humanitarian aid, development projects, and campaigns for political action. In Belgium you also know us from the second-hand shops, Oxfam Pakt Uit presents and Oxfam Trailwalker.
Oxfam-Magasins du Monde is fighting in Brussels and Wallonia for an alternative system of consumption and production. We conduct awareness campaigns and also sell fair trade products and second-hand clothing in a network of our own shops.
OUS agrees to fund CLV cluster with the total funding usd 10k. All financial accounting and reporting work is to be taken by the CLV cluster, using the financial system of Oxfam Belgium and Oxfam Novib.

Oxfam-Solidarity fightsagainst injustice and poverty. We do this through humanitarian aid, development projects, and campaigns for political action. In Belgium you also know us from the second-hand shops, Oxfam Pakt Uit presents and Oxfam Trailwalker.
Oxfam-Magasins du Monde is fighting in Brussels and Wallonia for an alternative system of consumption and production. We conduct awareness campaigns and also sell fair trade products and second-hand clothing in a network of our own shops.
OUS agrees to fund CLV cluster with the total funding usd10k. All financial accounting and reporting work is to be taken by the CLV cluster, using the financial system of Oxfam Belgium andOxfam Novib.

participating-org.narrative: Oxfam in Laos is registered under the legal personality of Oxfam in Belgium and is national country office for Oxfam international.Oxfam in Laos PDR is responsible for the implementation of the Sowing Diversity Harvesting = Security program in close coordinationwith national organizations including the National Agriculture and Forestry Research Institute (NAFRI), the Department of Agriculture (DOA), Ministry of Agriculture and Forestry (MAF) and Lao Farmers Network (LFN). Oxfam Belgium is one of 17 Affiliates that are part of the Oxfam Confederation. As part of this confederation, Oxfam Belgium shared the common vision of a just world without poverty. A world where people are valued and treated equally, enjoy their rightsas full citizens, and can influence decisions affecting their lives.

mailing-address.narrative: PO box 30919, 2500 GX The Hague, The Netherlands

sector.narrative: The right to basic social services

description.narrative: Civil society organisations influencing financial and fiscal justice have strengthened their capacity
CSO's that demonstrate increased expertise on financial justice
